properties.name: mpesa4j.debug
properties.description: Enables or disables debug mode.

properties.name: mpesa4j.sandbox-enabled
properties.description: Enables or disables MPesa's sandbox or live mode. Enabled uses sandbox-mode api endpoints, disabled toggles use of live-mode api endpoints.

properties.description: Enables or disables MPesa's sandbox or live mode. Enabled uses sandbox-mode api endpoints, disabled toggles use of live-mode api endpoints.
